main event: Witness observed an unidentified flying object with red lights that came closer and then sped away.
interesting points: The observation date discrepancy exists between 16 March 67 and 15 April 67,Two independent witnesses reported the sighting after initially seeing the object independently,The object was reported to have no sound even as it approached closely,10-12 lights were observed in a V formation possibly indicating bird activity,The object was visible for about 15 minutes before it gradually faded from sight.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with red lights
